1.content:
Doctor Small was, to say the least, an amoral man. He didn't view his fellow man as human. Rather, they were experiments. Elements which he could manipulate on a whim. It just so happened that he had his eye on a family of magnifiscent specimens. The Titan family: Tom, Lisa, Chad, and Molly. They were tall, statuesque, and athletic. Except for that Molly girl.

"But every chain has a weak link...no matter" said the doctor.

The doctor was an expert in many scientific fields, but one interested him in particular: human anthropology. He was obsessed with human instinct, the will to survive, and the desire to dominate. Dr. Small spent hours thinking of ways to test his theories, conduct the most definitive experiments, obtain the ultimate knowledge. But he needed to experiment on a large scale with two groups. Those that needed to survive, and those that wished to dominate. He already set his sights on one group, the Titan family. But he needed those which would flee from them in terror. Then, it came to him.

The lab he was working at was based in a military facility. The team of scientists located on the floor below him had been conducting experiments on the shrinking of matter. The objective was to find a way to shrink weapons and supplies. These would then be transported over to rebels in countries with dictators, and facilitate an uprising without the world knowing of an American involvement.

Luckily, they had built several prototypes of the shrinking device, and one of them was in storage. Dr. Small stole a passkey, and under the cover of darkness, walked into the storage facility. Seeing the shrink ray gun, the doctor smiled to himself. Such pleasure would await him.
1.title: The doctor's obsession

choices: Tom can't help himself, pulls out his cock
11.content:
Lisa Titan grabbed the ledge of the swimming pool, hoisting her long body out of the cool water. She glanced over at her husband, sunbathing himself in a lawn chair. He's so vain Lisa thought to herself. But then giggled to herself, realizing she took just as much pride in her own appearance. At 5'11'', with long blond hair, and plenty of muscle tone herself, she was a vision of feminine strength and sexuality. She often looked down on people, literally and figuratively.

She would often stare at the other women in the shopping market or department stores, imagining her long, tan, meaty foot on their faces. A sneer of disgust on her face. Those women that had let themselves become unfit for their husbands, spending money on useless baubles to improve their inferior appearance. She wished she could crush them like insects and be worshipped like a goddess by their lowly spouses.

Her current husband Tom nudged the the sunglasses down his nose and looked at his wife. She had that look on her face again. He had an idea of what she was thinking and it made him so horny. His muscles inadvertently flexed just from the thought of it. The large snake-like appendage in his speedo stirred awake. He got off his lawn chair and before Lisa could grab a towel, he embraced her in his arms, lifted her off the ground, and kissed her hard. She reached down and felt his bulge.

"Easy big man, save that for later and get back to your tan" she said with a smile. Tom smiled back, "you know you can't tell me what to do, not when we're out of bed". Lisa laughed and gave his package a quick sharp squeeze. He let go, enjoying the pain. Lisa wrapped a towel around herself and walked back into the house, her long wet soles slapping the tile.
11.title: Lisa and Tom Titan

111.content:
Meanwhile, back at the deranged Dr. Small's house, the owner of a brand new shrinking protoype arrived out of breath. The doctor was so nervous about his theft he was nearly unable to complete his mission. But this wasn't about him. This was for science. He layed the shrink ray upon his ornate glass table, quivering with joy. The anticipation was almost too much to handle. But what to test it on first? It had to be something organic, but small enough not to cause a mess if the experiment would fail.

The lonley whine of a cat broke through the almost deafening sound of the doctor's beating heart. He brushed his fingers through his hair and grabbed a carton of milk from the freezer. Opening the door, he caught sight of the unsuspecting cat. The carton in one hand, the shrink ray in the other, he began to poor milk on the cement in front of his door. The cat gratefully lapped up the precious liquid. The doctor looked around to make sure no one was watching and zapped the hapless kitty. A flash of light and a puff of smoke greeted the doctor, making him fall backwards in surprise.

The doctor quickly got up to see his results. The cat was nowhere in sight. "Damnit! A complete failure!" the doctor cried. He could see his dreams of shrunken specimens slipping away. That is, until he saw a rippling in the milk. Looking closer he noticed a nearly microscopic black dot circling in the pool of milk. The doctor carefully reached into the pool with a pair of pocket tweezers. Pinched in between the two metal pinchers was a very wet and very upset cat. The doctor smiled with glee and almost dropped the cat he was so happy. His first trial run had worked.

He could barely prevent himself from aiming the gun at the neighborhood houses, but a shocking thought stopped him in his tracks. If he shrunk each neighbor of the Titans one by one, the other neighbors would notice and inform the police. He had to shrink them all at the same time. It was a small wealthy community situated in the hills. If he shrank them all, no one would investigate for at least two weeks, perhaps three if he was lucky. He immediately began work on a "shrink bomb".

A month later the device was completed, he was a top scientist after all. The day he had finished he called the community leader and asked him to invite the entire community to a town hall meeting. Letters were immediately sent out claiming that the eminent scientist Dr. Lewis Small had made a discovery that would make their community famous. Dr. Small made sure to steal the notice delivered to the Titan's household so they wouldn't show up. It was summer and hot out, so Dr. Small knew from observing them for a month that there was no reason for the Titans to leave their house and wonder where everyone had gone.

The town meeting commenced and Dr. Small revealed the device. The audience gasped with surprise. Before them was a large crystalline sphere which shone with an odd light. "Gather around everyone, I want to expose you all to an experience you will never forget!" exclaimed the doctor. The entire community, about 150 people gathered around the crystal sphere in wonder and anticipation. Dr. Small pressed a button on the back of the sphere, watching a red light flash in a signal of preparation. He then excused himself, telling the community he needed a separate component to complete the demonstration.

While outside he removed a remote from his pocket and pushed the trigger. There was no noise, rather a shockwave that blew out all the windows and caused light smoke to pour out the openings. He went back inside the building carrying a slender, transparent container.
111.title: Dr. Small and the little community

choices: Tom and Lisa Titan wake up,
1111.content:
It was madness. White smoke covered the skies, women screamed, children cried, men pissed themselves. When the smoke cleared, micro sized community attempted to gather itself. One of the shrunken spoke up, "Ok let's everybody calm down. I'm sure what we're all seeing is merely an optical illusion created by Dr. Small. I know when he gets back, he'll turn off his device and all will be well." The people laughed, of course it was just an illusion. Something like this couldn't happen in real life. They all began to calm down, until they heard what sounded like thunder from far away, but was quickly approaching...

Dr. Small opened his glass container, sweat dripping down his forehead. He bent down, and to his delight, spotted the ultra small community. It was just as he expected, they didn't look like humans at all. Insect size at the most, barely noticeable by the human eye. He brought his hand down and began herding his captives into the container.

A giant hand landed witha BOOM behind the 150 frightened people. They shrieked with fear as the massive hand slid towards them at an amazing speed. It was a grotesque hand, covered with sweat and hair. It engulfed them and forced them into a glass structure the size of a stadium. The people looked up in horror at the doctor's face. There was a coldness to his eyes, but his massive worm like lips twitched into a perverted smile. There was evil in his intent.

The doctor walked with his precious cargo to his car and drove to the Titan's family home. He parked his car across the street and when darkness came, he flooded the Titan's house with a mild sleeping gas he had stolen from the lab. When he was sure they were asleep, he began the task of installing various cameras all over the house in order to track and record his experiment. When he was sure all the cameras were hidden and could not be found by the family, he opened the container of shrunken people again and emptied them in the center of the living room. 150 tiny individuals found themselves scattered across a carpet ocean. Confused and scared it would be the most difficult and deadly time of their lives.

The doctor gave them some parting words, "Do not despair my little specimens. Whether you survive or not, you will all be making history. You will not merely live among this Titan family, you will test your worthiness to even be noticed by them. And if you're lucky enough to get their attention, take comfort you will please your superiors with your deaths".

The shrinkees could barely understand the giant, but by the look on his face, they knew their lives had become insignificant. And the rising sun signaled a new day.
1111.title: Collecting the community

choices: Tom Titan gets out of bed
11111.content:
Doctor Small quietly let himself outside the Titan's house. He walked a few houses down to his own residence, sat in his basement, and switched on the recording signal. The experiment had begun.

The tinies were still in a state of absolute panic. The carpet fibers came up to their waists and made it almost impossible to move through. It was like walking in a field of soft cacti. It took awhile, but eventually families were reunited with each other, huddling together for safety. Everyone gave suspicious looks at everyone else. Surely this could not be the work of one demented man. People's cries of fear turned to anger when no answers were given as to how or why this had happened to them. They were about to riot out of sheer frustration when a thunderclap of metal silenced them.

In the distance a large door that was miles tall opened. Resting on the door handle was an enormous manicured hand with long blood red finger nails. Next appeared a giant female foot. It was long and thick, each toe the size of a bus. They were covered with clear nail polish, Lisa Titan had no need to paint them. She knew they were already beautiful enough to attract attention. Which they did, but for the wrong reasons. This attention came from a crippling fear of dozens of people. One step could easily kill two dozen of them if they stayed still long enough to get squashed.

One of the tinies had a different idea in mind. A retired police chief, he got up and with as loud a voice as he could make at his size said, "Listen up people we don't have a lot of time! If we all of us stay together like this that monster is bound to notice us and put us out of our misery. Let's separate into 3 groups of 50 and meet in a place that can't be seen by the giants! Now move out!".

The community quickly split up into 3 groups each making their way across the living room to avoid the giantess. One man however, refused to follow his fellow shrinkees. Dale Evans was a stubborn man, even ignoring the pleas of his wife and two children. He was in denial and couldn't believe that someone would crush him like a bug. He decided to get the attention of the towering giantess. His wife cried and screamed, holding onto his leg to try and slow him down. His two kids merely sat on the floor crying, the carpet fibers slightly above their heads.

BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM came the the thunderous footsteps of the goddess. Dale marched toward her in defiance. A determined look on his face. The calf muscles in Lisa Titan's legs flexed with each approaching step. A shadow of her long, battle ship sized feet proceeded each step. She walked with the confidence of a military commander, yet her shapely ass shifted from side to side in a feminine swagger. Dale Evans stood before her, arms crossed, his eyes focused skyward. His wife still clinging to his leg screamed in terror. A shadow loomed over the couple. Dale could see the wrinkles of experience in the foot and the muscle that powered it. He opened his mouth to speak, "Now listen up bitch, I demand that", Dale was cut off as the foot overtook him. A toe nail decapitated him, his head flying off into the distance. The pad of the toe landed squarely on Dale's wife. Her mouth became filled with toe flesh for a fraction of a second before her own head was turned into soup of bone and blood.

The two Evans children still sitting below the carpet fibers screamed in terror having just witnessed their parent's death. The foot approached, each line and groove like a narrow trench. The children held each other as a BOOM filled their ears causing them to immediately go deaf. They looked up into a sky of flesh. Sitting below the carpet fibers and under the long arch of the woman's foot had saved them. They watched as long tan legs carried harbingers of death and destruction off into the distance. The children got up and slowly made their way to the 3 groups that had split up. Dale and Mrs. Evans had not been worthy enough to be noticed.
11111.title: The experiment begins

choices: Lisa Titan looks under the couch...infestation!
Lisa turns around, the group moves on
111111.content:
A group of tinies led by a retired police chief cowered in fear under the couch as they saw the giantess casually walk across her living room floor, crushing a young couple in the process. The giantess was dressed in a long flowing robe, which exaggerated her prominent stature. She was truly the goddess of her world, dominating all those around her. One of the tinies, Jake Fletcher, noticed two small children off in the distance, looking for some form of cover.

Jake looked up and saw the giantess making coffee for herself in the distance. He yelled over to the young children, hoping they would notice the group and run for cover. "Hey kids! Over here quick! You'll be safe!"

The children couldn't hear them however. They still hadn't recovered from the booming noise of the giantess nearly crushing them with her wrinkled sole. Jake knew he had to move fast. Before anyone else volunteered, Jake quickly made his way through the carpet ocean, near the children. He was nearly upon them when he began to her an ominous sound. It was like an emergency siren. Jake stopped in his tracks and looked towards the kitchen. The giantess was humming a tune, slowly swirling her spoon in a fresh cup of coffee. Jake saw the muscles in her thigh twitch as her leg lifted up. The ball of her foot began tapping the kitchen floor. BOOM BOOM BOOM! It was the drum beat of impending doom.

Jake rushed over and grabbed the two children's arms. The trio began to run when Jake heard the sound of flesh twisting against tile. The giantess was turning around and heading straight for them! The slap of female foot flesh cracked through the air and the unlucky group was only halfway back to being under the saftey of the couch with their fellow tinies.

The goddess Lisa stood before the living room on the edge of the carpet. She made a contented sigh and looked down at her cup of coffee for a sip. Before the liquid passed her lips she noticed a small dot moving across the floor towards the couch. She smirked saying, "Just great, hope we don't have an infestation. Well it's summer and everything breeds in summer right? But you buggies won't get the chance." She seductively walked to the slowly moving spot.

Jake's lungs were near to bursting he couldn't take anymore but the muffled booms approaching quickened his legs. Two feet the size of battleships were right behind them. The children began to slow down, their tiny legs covering little ground. Jake knew what he had to do. He picked up a child in each arm, slowing him down. Right at the edge of the couch he threw them until they rolled to safety. Jake collapsed, too exhausted to move. Too exhausted to scream as the monolithic foot fell upon him. For a moment he noticed its beauty. The grooves and wrinkles, it was feminine yet muscular. It crushed him utterly in an orgasmic explosion of guts and blood. Lisa Titan smiled to herself, took a sip of coffee, and gave another contented sigh.
111111.title: Jake Fletcher's sacrifice

1111111.content:
Lisa Titan gripped her coffee cup between her two giant hands. She scrunched her toes against her new carpeting. Though one bug had just been crushed, there would surely be others, she thought to herself. That bug had been crawling towards the couch. Hopefully there were not more of them.

Walking towards her expensive couch, Lisa got down onto her hands and knees to take a look underneath. The vibrations of this caused the tiny community residing under there to panic. Some screamed, others were knocked off their feet by the impact. Lisa's massive shadow eclipsed the tiny's light source, as they were now staring at part of Lisa's face, trying to look underneath the couch. The tiny community did not know what to do. Should they try to get her attention? Should they stay still or run and hide? Several members of the group began to argue among themselves.

Lisa thought the could hear something underneath the couch but it was too dark to see anything. She walked back into the kitchen to grab a flashlight. The tiny people, thinking she had gone, were a bit relieved. They had already seen what her massive foot could do to poor Jake Fletcher. But then the floor started to rattle again. They could see the massive feet with bus-sized toes of Lisa approaching again, and again she went parallel to the ground. This time though, the community was in for a surprise.

Lisa had turned on a flashlight and shined it underneath the couch. The sudden outburst of light temporarily blinded the entire community. They screamed in horror. They had been caught off guard and had no idea what was going on. They began to blindly run in all directions. It was complete chaos underneath the couch.

"Crap!" Lisa yelled, startling the tiny individuals even more. "We have a god damn infestation. Well I guess we better do something about this." Normally Lisa would love to just use her massive feet to crush the insects, but being underneath the couch they were much harder to reach. "Hey Tom," she called out to her husband upstairs. There was no answer. Lisa was starting to get irritated now. This was not how she wanted to spend her morning.

What does Lisa decide to do?
1111111.title: Lisa Titan looks under the couch...infestation!

choices: Tom running into Dr. Small at Walmart
11111111.content:
"Hey Tom, honey? Where are you?" Lisa called out as she made her way up the stairs to her bedroom. To her surprise it was empty. "That's weird," she thought to her self. She could have sworn her husband was still upstairs.

Glancing at her phone, Lisa saw a text from Tom. It read "Hey honey. Ran to Walmart quick to grab some milk, bacon, and protein powder. Let me know if u need anything. Love you."

Lisa was mildly annoyed. Though she was happy her husband was doing something around the house and running errands, did he really need to be gone now, when she had an infestation of strange insects throughout her house. Well, it looked like Lisa was going to have to deal with the infestation by herself for right now.

Who do you follow next?
11111111.title: Go upstairs and get Tom

111111111.content:
Lisa Titan sighed but then began to descend back down the stairs. “I’m just as qualified as anyone to kill some pests,” she thought to herself with a laugh. She approached the couch where the tiny gathering of her neighbors were hiding.

From underneath the couch, people screamed as they saw the titanic bare feet of Lisa approaching. “We’ll be safe here, she can’t reach us!” some idiot called out. There was panic among the crowd. Everyone hoped they would be safe, but few believed they actually would be.

Lisa grabbed one end of the couch and began to left. As someone who kept in great shape, she had few issues rotating the piece of furniture. The tinies screamed as light began to flood their sanctuary, and within seconds, they were exposed to the outside world.

“NOW, WHAT SHOULD I DO WITH YOU BUGS?” the titanic blonde woman said, placing her hands on her hips.
111111111.title: Lisa dealing with the "bugs"

1111111111.content: "It is a capital sin to invade a goddess home. You should know that", she sayed with a kind smile. "And since you also where stupid enough to manage to get my attention..." With one swift movement the gigantic ped was above them and a second later among them. It was good that they had scattered like ants as they shook off their first shock of the moment. But it did not help them much. Lisas first stomp obliterated three at once underneath the smooth sole of her naked foot. She did not pause as her other foot followed suit and crushed another helpless victim underneath her big toe with no effort at all. Slowly twisting it left and right before dragging it back and lifted it up once more into the direction of a small group and cast them in her shadow. Her heel rested on the floor already as her foot slowly lowered down. Her toes raised and the muscles tensed although she barely noticed. But she did notice the squirms as the sensetive skin made contact with her victims. "hmmm.... squirm for me. And then die. That is the only thing you are good for when you dare to come in here" She enjoyed the wet sensation as she continued her masscre on the floor.
1111111111.title: Lisa lifts her bare foot

choices: Dr. Small shrinks the other family members
111111112.content:
At the local Walmart, the sinister Dr. Small had taken a break from watching the tiny neighborhood struggle for their lives in the Titan household. Even an evil scientist has to get groceries. While pacing the aisles of the store, Dr. Small stopped and did a double check.

Interesting. There in the aisle was Tom Titan, the bodybuilding patriarch of the Titan household.

Tom was currently looking at vitamin supplements. While contemplating which brand to buy, he was completely oblivious to the fact that the man shopping near him had been in his house, and definitely did not suspect he was watching a tiny society struggle for their lives inside his household.

Tom turned and started walking towards the exit, when he got a good look at Dr. Small. What the hell was this guy doing in this section of the store? Just looking at the guy, Tom could tell he probably never bought protein powder in his life. It was people like this who annoyed Tom.

Oh his way down the aisle, Tom made sure to bump into Dr. Small. "Watch it nerd," Tom said with a cocky laugh. "Looks like you're in the wrong aisle. Don't hurt yourself." Tom proceeded to laugh as continued to walk down the aisle to check out.

Dr. Small just stood there with a perplexed look on his face. "Where did that guy find the nerve to talk to him like that," he thought to himself. Then a smile crept across Dr. Small's face. "Well, I'll show him," he said.

Dr. Small wanted to teach Tom Titan a lesson in size. Thoughts started racing through his head. He could shrink Tom to the size of the other inhabitants and release him into his home. He also had the more sinister idea of shrinking Tom's family and letting them suffer through the punishment brought on by Tom.
111111112.title: Tom running into Dr. Small at Walmart

1111111121.content:
The more Dr. Small stewed in this thoughts, the more annoyed he became. Initially, he wanted nothing more than to shrink the entire neighborhood and release them in the home of the oblivious titan family. But now, the family's patriarch decided to flex, literally and figuratively, and had to put down Dr. Small. The crazed doctor wasn't taking that lightly.

As he followed the body builder back home, he pulled up to the Titan's driveway once Tom exited. Tom looked back in annoyance at his stalker. "What the hell are you doing here? Do I need to kick your ass?" he said and aggressively started approaching the man.

Dr. Small just smiled before pulling out the shrink ray and firing it at the jacked up man. Tom instantly diminished in size to a speck, the same as all the other victims of Dr. Small. Collecting his tiny prize, Dr. Small quietly snuck into the Titan's house and deposited the now tiny Tom on the floor.

"Good luck!" he laughed before leaving to watch from the safety of the cameras he had set up.

Down on the floor, Tom was panicking. He had never pictured himself as tiny or defenseless, and now he was both. He was completely at the mercy of his environment, and that terrified him. Then, Tom heard a noise behind him.

He turned to see...
1111111121.title: Dr. Small shrinks Tom

1111111122.content:
Dr. Small grinned wildly as he planned his revenge on Tom Titan. How dare this man insult him! Just cause Tom had a fantastic physique didn't give him the right to insult and torment those smaller than him, Dr. Small thought, completely oblivious to the hypocrisy of his own thoughts.

Watching Tom walk out of the store carrying a container of protein powder under each of his muscular arms, Dr. Small realized how he would orchestrate his revenge. He decided to take what Tom Titan loved most, and reduce it. He would shrink one of Tom's family members to the same size as all the other speck-sized beings in the Titan household at the moment.

Covertly following Tom Titan back to his house, Dr. Small observed the muscular man walk into his backyard and lay up on the pool deck. Quietly slipping into the home, as to not attract attention, Dr. Small's plan was in high gear. He would shrink a member of Tom's family to speck-size, and release them into Tom's room. There, through his hidden cameras, he would be able to watch their struggle as they desperately tried to get the patriarch's attention.

Dr. Small smiled as he decided to srhink who...
1111111122.title: Dr. Small shrinks the other family members

choices: Adam goes back inside to collect specimens
11111112.content:
Lisa sighed. "Well, we're off to a great start to the day," Lisa said to herself, or so she thought. She walked across the kitchen and grabbed the phone. Now she would have to pay an exterminator to take care of this bug problem. She began dialing the number for the Bug-B-Gone company to make an appointment.

Underneath the couch, the tiny community was actively listening to the conversation their giantess of a neighbor was having. All they knew was that she was on the phone.

"Yes this is Lisa Titan. I have a colony of small bugs beneath the couch. No I don't know what kind. A half hour? Great. See you then."

The tiny people were having mixed reactions. Some thought this would be a chance to get noticed while others thought it was a death sentence.

Meanwhile, Dr. Small had seen everything on the hidden cameras. While he wanted to see the tiny individuals try to survive, this would end his experiment way too early. He had to stop the exterminator.

A half hour passed and a young 20 something year old stepped out of the truck. He introduced himself to Lisa Titan as Adam. As the two talked in the living room, the tiniest could hear he wanted a specimen to see what type of insect it was. Dr. Small was trying to get to the house so he could get rid of the exterminator but did not want to get caught by the titans, what happens next?
11111112.title: Call an exterminator

choices: Lisa Titan returns to the living room
Adam is saved by the tinies before Lisa returns
111111121.content:
Dr. Small knew he had to do something to get rid of the exterminator. As Dr. Small racked his brain for ways to get rid of the exterminator, his shrink caught his eye. He grinned as he knew just what to do.

He grabbed up the shrink ray and made his way upstairs. The doctor exited his house and quickly made his way to the Titan house. He saw the exterminator's truck sitting in front of the house as he approached the Titan household.

As he made his way to the front door of the house, the door suddenly opened. Dr. Small immediately dove into the bushes just barely avoiding being seen.

"I'm just going to go to my truck and grab a few things, Mrs. Titan and then I'll be right back inside and we can see if we get one of those insects so we know what we're dealing with."

"Excellent," Lisa responded, "oh, my husband is calling me and I have to take this call. I'll leave the front door unlocked for you Adam and I'll meet you back in the living room, it should just be a short call."

"Not a problem Mrs. Titan, I'll be back in momentarily." Adam replied.

Dr. Small heard the exterminator walk away and the door close. He watched as the twenty-something year old made his way to the truck. A devious idea popped into Dr. Small' head.

Dr. Small hopped out of the bushes and pulled out the shrink ray. The exterminator's back was to him and Dr. Small aimed the gun at the truck first and fired. The truck was engulfed in light and quickly disappeared.

Before Adam could even realized what had happened, Dr. Small fired a second time and Adam was shrink to bug size. Dr. Small laughed as he approached the shrunken truck and man, reaching down scooping them both up.

Adam was still in a complete daze as he was ripped through the air. He was extremely disoriented and close to blacking out. He wasn't sure where he was or what was even going on. Adam could hear what seemed to be thunderous laughter and felt that he was on a rather clammy, fleshy surface.

Dr. Small dropped the exterminator's truck into his pocket and made his way back to the Titan house. Laughing as he held the insect sized exterminator in his hand.

He entered through the front door and paused, peeking about the house to make sure Lisa Titan wasn't right inside. He could hear her voice coming from the upstairs, clearly still wrapped up in her phone conversation.

Doctor Small went into the living room and paused before dumping the tiny exterminator into the center of the floor. He laughed as he saw how tiny the exterminator was on the floor.

"You came here to exterminate some bugs but it looks like you're the bug that needs to be exterminated now." Dr. Small laughed.

Adam was still completely dazed and disoriented as Doctor Small made his way out of the house.
111111121.title: Dr. Small shrinks the exterminator

choices: Follow Alex Harper, punk teenager and amateur survivalist
11112.content:
Molly's little hand came down on her alarm with undue force. Despite the fact that the clock reads 4 AM she hops out of bed and jogs lightly down the hall still in her night-dress. She creeps through the house on quiet bare feet and makes for the living room. She passes every light switch along the way, deciding to remain in the dark -- her family couldn't know. 'If Mom finds me she's gonna have me swimming laps for hours,' Molly considered with dread. If she had made a list of the things she hated and the rest of his family loved (a lengthy list indeed), laps would be at the top, right above protein-bars -- 'yuaeeck'
~~~

"We have to start moving," Richard argued. He hadn't got a chance to speak his mind at the meeting and he was just pissed about the new skate-boarding restrictions. Now that he was a fraction of a fraction of an inch in height and his life hung in the balance he sure as hell was going to make this an open forum, "you saw the look on that monster's face, what are the chances you think, he put us somewhere safe?"

Fredrick Deems was a community leader and by no coincidence one of the wealthiest men in the Forest-Hills neighborhood. He studied law at Harvard and for many a year taught it at Yale. Presently he owned the most successful private practice in the state, but he now finds himself the size of a flea's dinner arguing with some pocked face teenager even smaller than he telling him what to do. "We know very little yet about our surroundings." Deems makes sure to look out into the crowd, not even making eye contact with the punk kid to whom his rebuttal was truly directed. "Before we act rashly and worsen our situation further, we should take tome to reconnoiter and.."

"Reconnoiter?!" the kid dared interrupt his elder and 'social-better', "are you freaking kidding me. We are sitting in the middle of some giant family's carpet. Who knows when they're gonna wake up?!"

'So its a debate you want,' Deems wrung his hand at the prospect, 'well then..' "You said you thought this scientist had an evil look about him, well if he was evil as I think we all agree he was..." The crowd, starting to coalesce amongst the carpet fibers, murmured its assent. "...then when you consider the man's intellect it becomes more likely that he would have predicted our instinctual fear and placed us somewhere where rash action," he finally makes eye contact with the little twirp, "like running, might very well result in our doom. Perhaps the family pet is sleeping just out of sight or a giant..."

The boy did not relent, 'this guy isn't just an asshole, he's also a moron and that's a bad combination.' "Man haven't you ever seen Honey I Shrunk the Kids. If there was a giant anywhere around us, even a sleeping one we'd.." THUDDD!!! Several people fall at the impact of what can be none other than a titan footstep broadcasting in waves across the sweeping plain of carpet. Before most could get back to their feet another came, this time carrying even more amplitude with it. Deems himself was knocked onto his ass. "Stay where you are everyone," he cries from his pitiful prone position.

"Stay with me if you want to live!" cried Alex as he takes off running.
11112.title: Late Night Secrets/Tiny Power Games

choices: ..screams -- he's lost his mind looking at the squashed entrails of his son.
111121.content:
Molly walks across the carpet to her parent's affluent flat-screen and starts hooking up her emulator. It is a Frankenstein monster of microchips attached to a partly wooden control panel complete with joy stick. She made it herself -- 'and Mom and Dad said video games killed your creativity.' Maybe that was true of games these days with their hyper-realistic graphics, but the ones she played left a lot of room for your imagination.

Flicking on the wide t.v. displayed a list of games not a one post dating the millenium. Showing the Gs at present it sported such titles as Gauntlet and Golden Ax. Molly laughed thinking of the micro game withing Golden Ax where your hero must bludgeon annoying gnomes to death as part of their never ending quest for potions. Her hand hovered over the button almost selecting it for just the micro game (she'd beaten it more times than she could remember). But, inevitably she scrolled down to the Rs where her current obsession was located -- Rampage.
~~~

"Clifford," Deems called to his fat son who is bracing himself against a bushel of rug fibers to keep from falling over. The porky teenager was terrified than anyone; in fact, as he looked up at something a wide stinking stain spread out from his crotch. 'My son is wetting himself?! Ever an embarassment to the family.' "Clifford, a Deems is a Deems no matter how tall so suck it up and for god sakes clean yoursel..." Suddenly Fredrick's view of his son is replaced by a pink wall. The tiny lawyer gazes up to survey a titanic toe whose nail hovers hundreds of feet above. Further up, adrift in the stratosphere, he can just make out the hem of a night dress streaking across the sky like a con-trail.

When the Goddess raises her toe, the gorey remains of Cliff string out between it and the floor. Confronted with the liquified remains of a son Fredrick puts his hands to his face and...
111121.title: First Blood

choices: Try to go to war with Molly
1111212.content:
Frederick stood there, mouth agape in partial disbelief. In a split second, his son Clifford, his own flesh and blood, had been reduced to nothing more than a puddle of blood with fleshy entrails. In his position now rested the monumental big toe, of a previously petite little girl.

Molly had no idea of the consequences of her actions, she just wanted to play her video game. She was completely unaware of the perils the shrunken community were now forced to face in her presence.

Frederick Deems yelled at the top of his tiny lungs. He was frustrated at the entire situation and charged towards the giantess Molly. "Everyone follow me," Frederick yelled. The people panicking on the floor turned their attention to him. They had no idea what he was doing. Frederick, in desperation and anger, decided everyone needed to.....
1111212.title: ...calls out rallying the remaining tinies.

choices: One of the shrunken people in his house
11113.content:
Dr. Small had make it back to his house down the block. Entering his eerily creepy basement, he switched on all of the cameras and monitors. Luckily for him, the Titan family had all been asleep while he wired hidden cameras throughout their house. He could now safely, for him, observe the tiny community trying to survive in their new expansive hell.

At 7:00 in the morning, Chad Titan's alarm went off. Getting out of his bed, Chad took off his shirt and looked at himself in the mirror. He was proud of his physique and kept in great shape. Even though it was a Saturday, Chad decided not to sleep in, and go for a jog instead. Throwing on his running gear, he quietly exited the house and went for his hour run. Luckily for the shrunken individuals downstairs on the floor, he avoided stepping on any of them as he left the house, for now.

Returning from his house around 8:00, Chad was exhausted. He had been pushing himself to improve his cardio, and he thought it was paying off. He was covered in sweat and needed a shower. As he walked towards the bathroom, he saw his little sister Molly was also on her way there. "Move pipsqueak," he laughed as he brushed past her.

"Hey that's not fair Chad," she whined. "I was gonna go first."

Chad was amused. "Yeah well get in better shape and maybe you can beat me there," he said in a cocky tone. Molly skulked off towards the kitchen while Chad was laughing at his own joke.

Exiting the shower, Chad went back up towards his room. His parents were sleeping in today and he decided to see what his girlfriend Amanda was doing. "Hey babe, wanna come over," Chad sent off in a text message. What he did not realize is that Amanda was.....
11113.title: Chad Titan (son)  wakes up

choices: Jen sneaks out because the doc is crazy
Jen waits for the doc to leave to steal more cigarettes
1112.content:
Jenna wasn't very interested in anything, but her parents made her go to this doopy event. While dressed "nice" because her parents made her do so, she acted like she was smiling to the other pretty girls acting like their friend... Then slipped into the lady's room to sneak a cigarette and text on her phone to one of her real friends, another goth girl that got transferred to another school.

For a moment they bounced texts back and fourth about how bad life sucked and how bored they were while Jen smoked her cigarette she'd stolen from the volley ball coach at school and hid in her purse.

Suddenly things went wrong and this translucent wave went through the room like a ghost from a movie. Jenna's eyes went wide looking at it, then she noticed that all of the people jibbering excitedly outside had gone to nothing.

Carefully she peeped out the door and was amazed that everyone was gone already. Where did they go so fast? That science guy must have told them to go outside or something. Then she noticed that there were women's purses strewn about and draped over the backs of chairs.

"While they're gone..." Jen was going to take this chance to snake on the other women's cigarettes. Sneaking behind a partition, she kept watch for anyone coming back. Then she heard someone coming and dipped down behind the chair caddy.

"NOW my little ones, come to me willingly and I'll make this brief," the scientist guy said. "Like, who's he talking to?" Jen asked herself barely peeping from behind the folding chair caddy to see the guy playing with the carpet. And talking to the carpet.

"What the hell?"
1112.title: some of the community escapes

choices: she snorts one up like a vacuum cleaner takes the other insects home
tortures one with a cigarette takes the other insects home
11122.content:
Jenn silently watched the scientist leave, a clear container held tightly to his chest. "Weirdo", Jenn muddered to herself. She took another look around and grabbed a pack of cigarettes from one of the women's purses. She wondered briefly where everyone had gone. Was the presentation over already? But if that was true, why had everyone left there coats and jackets? Jenn didn't think about it for long. She wasn't the type to have much concern for others. She opened a fresh pack and lit a cig with her lighter, a skull painted on its side.

She sucked in a long drag, and exhaled through her nostrils like a dragon. She walked over to where the doctor Small had been kneeling down and collecting something off the carpet. She got on her hands and knees, eyes close to the floor. At first she saw nothing, but then movement caused her to raise an inquisitive eyebrow. On the floor were perhaps a dozen very small insects. Jenn laughed, what must've sounded like cannons to the tiny creatures. She took another puff and blew it out through her nostrils onto the tinies. She laughed again and suddenly her goth nature gave her a wicked idea...
11122.title: Jen waits for the doc to leave to steal more ci...

info.brief_description: An evil scientist shrinks a neighborhood and puts them in the house of an unaware family!
info.description:
As an evil social experiment, Dr. Small has shrunk an entire neighborhood to the size of insects! He placed them in a container and slipped them into the mail slot of a home. The residents of the neighborhood must now survive the unaware family.

Characters - The unaware family

Tom (The Father) 42 years old. A professional body builder, he's a mountain of a man. Dark hair, full of muscle, handsome face with a granite jaw.

Lisa (The Mother) 37 years old. Showing some signs of age but still keeps very fit to keep up with her husband. Tall for a woman (5ft11in) and lean. Long blond hair, thick lips. She has very big feet :)

Chad (The Son) 17 years old. A surfer type that's tall with lean muscle and long blond hair. A true combination of his parents.

Molly (The Daughter) 9 years old. A skinny little girl with dirty blond hair, she has inferiority issues about her size and jealous of her big athletic family.

Here's the important rules:

1 - Family must either be unaware of the shrunken people OR think they are bugs.
2 - Keep track of names so things don't get confusing
3 - No one-sentence chapters please, or they'll be deleted
4 - Sex and violence are fine
5 - Feel free to create your own characters BUT, don't forget to keep track of names

and most importantly, have fun!
